verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. The king <S%H4428><s%> shall joy <S%H8055><s%> in thy strength <S%H5797><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; And in thy salvation <S%H3444><s%> how greatly <S%H3966><s%> shall he rejoice <S%H1523><s%>!
Thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> him his heart <S%H3820><s%>'s desire <S%H8378><s%>, And hast not withholden <S%H4513><s%> the request <S%H782><s%> of his lips <S%H8193><s%>. [Selah <S%H5542><s%>]
For thou meetest <S%H6923><s%> him with the blessings <S%H1293><s%> of goodness <S%H2896><s%>: Thou settest <S%H7896><s%> a crown <S%H5850><s%> of fine gold <S%H6337><s%> on his head <S%H7218><s%>.
He asked <S%H7592><s%> life <S%H2416><s%> of thee <S%H5414><s%>, thou gavest it him <S%H753><s%>, Even length of days <S%H3117><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5769><s%>.
His glory <S%H3519><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> in thy salvation <S%H3444><s%>: Honor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty <S%H1926><s%> dost thou lay upon him <S%H7737><s%>.
For thou makest <S%H7896><s%> him most blessed <S%H1293><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>: Thou makest <S%H7896><s%> him glad <S%H8057><s%> with joy in thy presence <S%H6440><s%>.
For the king <S%H4428><s%> trusteth <S%H982><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; And through the lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> of the Most High <S%H5945><s%> he shall not be moved <S%H4131><s%>.
Thy hand <S%H3027><s%> will find out <S%H4672><s%> all thine enemies <S%H341><s%>; Thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> will find out <S%H4672><s%> those that hate thee <S%H8130><s%>.

Thou wilt make <S%H7896><s%> them as a fiery <S%H784><s%> furnace <S%H8574><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of thine anger <S%H6440><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will swallow them up <S%H1104><s%> in his wrath <S%H639><s%>, And the fire <S%H784><s%> shall devour them <S%H398><s%>.
Their fruit <S%H6529><s%> wilt thou destroy <S%H6><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%>, And their seed <S%H2233><s%> from among the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>.
For they intended <S%H5186><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against thee <S%H2803><s%>; They conceived a device <S%H4209><s%> which they are not able to perform <S%H3201><s%>.
For thou wilt make <S%H7896><s%> them turn their back <S%H7926><s%>; Thou wilt make ready <S%H3559><s%> with thy bowstrings <S%H4340><s%> against their face <S%H6440><s%>.
Be thou exalted <S%H7311><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, in thy strength <S%H5797><s%>: So will we sing <S%H7891><s%> and praise <S%H2167><s%> thy power <S%H1369><s%>.
